content: needle and 20 instep stitches round 1 knit all stitches round 2 knit until 3 stitches remain on the first needle k2tog k1 knit all the stitches on the next needle on the remaining needle k1 ssk knit to the end of the needle two gusset stitches have been decreased repeat these two rounds 9 more times 10 times total until there are a total of 42 stitches remaining 20 instep stitches and 22 sole stitches 11 per needle counting your set-up round you will have knit 21 rounds from the heel the foot you will be able to try your sock on after you have completed several inches of stockinette this is the best way to check the overall length of your sock work in stockinette stitch until your sock is 1 5 inches shorter than the desired total sock length slightly stretched remember to move your stitch marker up every few row keep track of how many rounds you knit in this section and record it here to aid in working the second sock total foot rounds = __________ the toe place markers pm and redistribute stitches as follows set-up round with the first needle k7 pm k7 you will have to steal stitches from the next needle to accomplish this with a new needle k7 pm k7 with a new needle k7 pm k7 you now have your stitches evenly distributed over three needles there are 14 stitches per needle with a stitch marker evenly dividing the stitches evenly on each needle shape the toe by decreasing as follows round 1 knit all stitches slipping markers as you come to them round 2 knit all stitches slipping markers as you come to them round 3 knit until 2 stitches before the marker k2tog knit until 2 stitches remain on needle k2tog repeat 2 more times six stitches decreased repeat rounds 1 through 3 two more times 3 times total there are a total of 24 stitches remaining 8 per needle  2011 dabberdesigns@gmail com travel socks v1 0 docx page 3 of 4 then repeat only rounds 2 and 3 twice there are a total of 12 stitches remaining 4 per needle finally repeat only rounds 3 once removing markers as you work around there are a total of 6 stitches remaining 2 per needle finishing break yarn leaving a 12-inch tail thread yarn onto tapestry needle thread tapestry needle through remaining stitches and pull through to the inside pull tight fasten_off and weave in ends knit second sock the same as the first wet block and allow to dry  2011 dabberdesigns@gmail com travel socks v1 0 docx page 4 of 4
